text: int main ( ) { long int a [ 100005 ] ; int i , j , n , t ; scanf ( "%d" , & t ) ; for ( i = 0 ; i < t ; i ++ ) { int count = 0 , len = 1 ; scanf ( "%d" , & n ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n ; j ++ ) scanf ( "%ld" , & a [ j ] ) ; for ( j = 0 ; j < n - 1 ; j ++ ) { if ( a [ j + 1 ] >= a [ j ] ) len ++ ; else { count = count + ( len * ( len - 1 ) ) / 2 ; len = 1 ; } } if ( len > 1 ) count = count + ( len * ( len - 1 ) ) / 2 ; printf ( "%d" , n + count ) ; printf ( "\n" ) ; } return 0 ; }
